mean_cn: v. 给……一个新名称，采用新名称
mean_en: to change the image of a company or an organization or one of its products or services, for example by changing its name or by advertising it in a different way
sentence: This company rebranded in order to attract more users.
sentence_trans: 为了吸引更多用户，这个公司更换了自己产品的名字。
